Definition at line 172 of file dense.c.

static int left_cyclic ( double  x[],
int  ldx,
int  j,
int  k,
double  cosines[],
double  sines[] 
) [static]

Perform a left cyclic shift of columns j to k in the upper triangular matrix x, then restore it to upper triangular form with Givens rotations.

The algorithm is based on the Fortran routine DCHEX from Linpack.

The lower triangle of x is not modified.

Parameters:
x Matrix stored in column-major order
ldx leading dimension of x
j column number (0-based) that will be shifted to position k
k last column number (0-based) to be shifted
cosines cosines of the Givens rotations
sines sines of the Givens rotations
Returns:
0 for success
